hadiths.text: It was narrated that Muhammad bin Abi 'Aishah said:"I heard Abu Hurairah say: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: When one of you recites the tashahhud, let him seek refuge with Allah (SWT) from our things: From the torment of hell, from the torment of the grave, from the trials of life and death and from the evils of the Dajjal. Then let him pray for himself asking whatever he wants
